name: 'Big D' Ranch Burgers
author: Anonymous
summary: Give your burger night some spicy Western flavor with A.1. Original Steak Sauce, KRAFT Prepared Horseradish, onions and bell peppers.
ingredients: 1 cup sliced onions, separated into rings
½ medium green pepper, cut into strips
½ medium red pepper, cut into strips
directions: Cook and stir onion, green pepper and red pepper in hot oil in skillet on medium heat until crisp-tender
Stir in steak sauce and horseradish
Remove from heat; cover to keep warm
Grill patties 5 minutes on each side or until cooked through
Top bottom half of each roll with patty; cover with 1/4 of the vegetable mixture and top half of roll
